snippet: The author of “The Lost Years” and many other novels was once thrilled to spot a fellow air passenger reading one of her books. Moments later, the reader was fast asleep.
abstract: By the Book interview with Mary Higgins Clark, author of The Lost Years, who recalls her happiness after seeing a fellow passenger reading one of her books on a plane.
lead_paragraph: The author of “The Lost Years” and many other novels was once thrilled to spot a fellow air passenger reading one of her books. Moments later, the reader was fast asleep.
